cause.description:
We aim towards maintaning and shaping a socialist organization of the oppressed youth minds. A revolution must lead to greater democratic guarantees for the oppressed classes of the society, otherwise it must not be....
A revolution that aims towards eliminating poverty and unemployment or at the very least, to act sincerely and responsibly to solve this core issue. This can be sustained by reserving the power in the hands of the community as a whole not controlled by aristocratic surnames....
YES... Another world is possible!! We can work together to make a difference... hand in hand, we can make the world a better place to be...
1. Property and distribution of wealth are subject to control by the community...
2. Economic equality and the abolishment of poverty and unemployment...
3. Another world is possible...!!
cause.name: Socialist Left Party
